Package com.github.moribund.objects.attributes

The attributes of a game object.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Collidable
    A Collidable entity that can be collided with a Projectile.
    Flaggable
    A {code Flaggable} object is an object that has Flags.
    FluidMovable
    A FluidMovable object is an object that can move with a dependence on its rotation angle.
    Locatable  
    Movable
    A Movable object is an object that can move from its initial position.
    RestrictedMovable
    A RestrictedMovable object is an object that can only move up, down, left, or right.

Package com.github.moribund.objects.attributes Description

The attributes of a game object. This allows for the maximum usage of Polymorphism.
